hobbieActivities: League of Legends <small style='text-transform: none; padding: 0.25rem; opacity: 0.8;'>(just watch)</small>
whoAmI: I really admire those who know from an early age what they want to be in the future... although this is not exactly my case.

I decided for IT due to a simple reason, among the options I had, this was the one that I identified the most. Today I can say that it was one of the best decisions I've ever made, of course, there are some days when I think about dropping everything and living in the field üòÖ... but I think this is quite normal for those who work with IT.

In general, I consider myself as a simple person that has already learned lots of things through these years but that still needs to learn much more, I always try to give my best because this is the only way to be proud of what I do.

Working as a Frontend, I've found it's almost impossible to keep up with all the new features, but I'm used to reading mostly articles from a site called Medium and taking some courses on Youtube or the Udemy platform.

Tamb√©m tive a oportunidade de participar do meu primeiro projeto internacional, o aplicativo que est√°vamos desenvolvendo era voltada para documenta√ß√£o de processos de IOT aplciados em grande escala. Sinto que cresci muito profissionalmente durante o tempo em que fiz parte deste time.

Aqui foi onde creio ter superado muitas a minha zona de conforto. Pela Keyrus atuei em diversos clientes, dentre eles AB-Inbev, Honda, Claro, Carrefour... Somente nos clientes em dois destes clientes realmente atuei como Frontend, nos demais acabei axiliando as equipes locadas em outras tecnologias. Creio que meu tempo nesta empresa me fez amadurecer e entender melhor o mundo corporativo.

Sendo esta a primeira empresa em que atuei, foi de fato onde aprendi muito da base que carrego at√© hoje.
